user.title: Connect to HA 3D Blueprint
user.description: Please enter the hostname of your HA 3D Blueprint add-on. This is usually 'local-blueprint-engine'.

select_devices.title: Select Blueprint Devices
select_devices.description: Select your stationary Bluetooth devices (at least 3) and your single mobile device. The integration will automatically find the necessary distance and beacon sensors.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the add-on. Please check the hostname and ensure the add-on is running.
error.not_enough_devices: Please select at least 3 stationary devices.

abort.no_sensors_found: Could not automatically find the required sensors from the selected devices. Please check that the source integration (e.g., Bermuda) has created the distance and BLE transmitter sensors and that they are named descriptively.
